content: this is a plain ribbed beanie hat it is called exeter because of the way the crown decreases interact with the ribbing it is reminiscent of the ceiling in the nave of exeter cathedral the 2x2 tubular cast-on is a great way to start this hat **decrease 2014 ** i have updated the pattern to replace all of the left/right decreases with explicit ssks k2togs p2togs and ssps also there is now a chart 1 https //ysolda com/blogs/journal/long-tail-tubular-cast-on-video
